oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SusCa circles to activate catering services in the public sector in local and organic food procurement
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Muukka, Eija
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Markets and trade
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: SusCa circles working for promoting sustainable foodstuff procurement are starting operations all around Finland. SusCa circles are part of EkoCentria's Sustainable Catering in Public Services project.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Muukka, Eija (2009) SusCa circles to activate catering services in the public sector in local and organic food procurement. EkoCentria.
